abstract: An insightful documentary about Germans in Australia from 1837 to 1988.
description: Explores German-Australian culture and identity and reveals the success and innovation of many German-Australians, both locally and abroad. The film was a Bicentennial gift from the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany.
